channel.title: Point system
channel.description:
hi is there anyway to make a system that every hour you are onine you get 1 tokul and to get that point you must talk to a special npc so that you cant just afk for your points and how would i make a shop for those
this is a 317 pimpscape base , delta works too

item.title: Point system
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Programming is about thinking in a logical manner about how to accomplish a specific task.

Make a list of the logical steps that you think should be taken to accomplish this.

[/quote]uhm you can do this but you would have to set it up as a vote system type of thing i could help you do that
[/quote]cody, I would also like to set up a vote system pm me for details[/quote]
ill send you a link of how to set up a vote system
